name: Toor Daal with Bay Leaf and crisp Cilantro (Pigeon Pea soup) with Jeera Rice
description: Comfort food for any day! A vegan and gluten free recipe.
recipeIngredient: 2 Teaspoons organic canola oil or coconut oil
1  whole red chili broken into 2 (or 1 green chili chopped)
Add 1/4 teaspoon paprika or 1/4 teaspoon cumin powder to the tadka
Add a teaspoon of Tamarind pulp

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and soak daal/lentils for half an hour. If not using pressure cooker then soak for atleast 4 hours.
recipeInstructions.name: Wash and soak daal/lentils for half an hour. If not using pressure cooker then soak for atleast 4 hours.

recipeInstructions.text: In pressure cooker or a medium deep pan, add oil and heat on medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: In pressure cooker or a medium deep pan, add oil and heat on medium heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Test the heat by adding a few mustard seeds to the oil; if they crack immediately, the oil is ready.
recipeInstructions.name: Test the heat by adding a few mustard seeds to the oil; if they crack immediately, the oil is ready.

recipeInstructions.text: Add mustard seeds, and after a few seconds, add bay leaves and red chili/green chili, stir for 10-15 seconds.
recipeInstructions.name: Add mustard seeds, and after a few seconds, add bay leaves and red chili/green chili, stir for 10-15 seconds.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chopped cilantro and cook for a minute or so until it crisps up.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the chopped cilantro and cook for a minute or so until it crisps up.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the tomatoes and turmeric. Mix well and cook covered until tomatoes are half done.(3-4 minutes)
recipeInstructions.name: Add the tomatoes and turmeric. Mix well and cook covered until tomatoes are half done.(3-4 minutes)

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse Daal and add with water and salt. Mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Rinse Daal and add with water and salt. Mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Pressure cook for 2 whistles on medium, or cook covered for 20-30 minutes on medium-low, or until daal is starts to mix with the water.
recipeInstructions.name: Pressure cook for 2 whistles on medium, or cook covered for 20-30 minutes on medium-low, or until daal is starts to mix with the water.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot with fresh cumin Rice.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot with fresh cumin Rice.

recipeInstructions.text: Add lemon juice if needed. Or serve along with some Indian Pickle/Achar.
recipeInstructions.name: Add lemon juice if needed. Or serve along with some Indian Pickle/Achar.
